UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Comparative antimicrobial activity and mechanism of action of bovine lactoferricin-derived synthetic peptides.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Han F, Xie Y, Wang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli K88(no activity data),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CMCC 50020(no activity data),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 50013(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(no activity data)
